title: Watch Designer
summary: Watch Face Designer For Android Wear. WatchDesigner , Watch Maker ,Watch Editor
description: WatchDesigner is watch face for your Android Wear device.Features:✔ Text✔ Time✔ Date✔ Month✔ Battery indicator✔ Custom color configuration✔ Custom hour format✔  Support for round & square watch facesThis app works on all android wear devices with round or square screen.If you find any bugs or you have any suggestions, please email me at watchdesigner1005@gmail.com in order to correct or implement it.
descriptionHTML:
WatchDesigner is watch face for your Android Wear device.

Features:

✔ Text
✔ Time
✔ Date
✔ Month
✔ Battery indicator
✔ Custom color configuration
✔ Custom hour format
✔ Support for round & square watch faces

This app works on all android wear devices with round or square screen.

If you find any bugs or you have any suggestions, please email me at watchdesigner1005@gmail.com in order to correct or implement it.
comments: Useless for sony sw2 Since I don't get any reply to my email I would like to have a full refund. It's not about the money, it's about respect.
Needs more Maybe more options for the watch face would be cool to upload my own photo, plus a weather widget would be helpful other than that I love this app
Love the app but transfer seems a little hit or miss. Also watch faces do not support the 24hr clock
I really like it! More widgets are needed. But the gui is very nice and simple
Cool This application is off to a great start. Looking forward to updates.
